Title: Relates to authorizing any city or town, except New York city, to establish community preservation funds
Summary: Authorizes all towns and cities outside of New York city to establish community preservation funds; authorizes the imposition of a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in such community preservation funds.
LawCode: Amd ยง6-s, Gen Muni L; amd ยง1560, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the tax law, in relation to expanding the authorization for the establishment of community preservation funds to include any town or city within a county but excluding cities with a population of one million or more
